verses.verse: These are now the <S%H7218>chief<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers<s%>, and this is the <S%H3187>genealogy<s%> of them that went <S%H5927>up<s%> with me from <S%H894>Babylon<s%>, in the <S%H4438>reign<s%> of <S%H783>Artaxerxes<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%>.

Of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6372>Phinehas<s%>; <S%H1647>Gershom<s%>: of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H385>Ithamar<s%>; <S%H1840>Daniel<s%>: of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%>; <S%H2407>Hattush<s%>.

Of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7935>Shechaniah<s%>, of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6551>Pharosh<s%>; <S%H2148>Zechariah<s%>: and with him were reckoned by <S%H3187>genealogy<s%> of the <S%H2145>males<s%> an <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H2572>fifty<s%>.
Of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6355>Pahath-moab<s%>; <S%H454>Elihoenai<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2228>Zerahiah<s%>, and with him two <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H2145>males<s%>.
Of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7935>Shechaniah<s%>; the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3166>Jahaziel<s%>, and with him <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H2145>males<s%>.
Of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> also of <S%H5720>Adin<s%>; <S%H5651>Ebed<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3129>Jonathan<s%>, and with him <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H2145>males<s%>.
And of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5867>Elam<s%>; <S%H3470>Jeshaiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6271>Athaliah<s%>, and with him <S%H7657>seventy<s%> <S%H2145>males<s%>.
And of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H8203>Shephatiah<s%>; <S%H2069>Zebadiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4317>Michael<s%>, and with him <S%H8084>fourscore<s%> <S%H2145>males<s%>.

Of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3097>Joab<s%>; <S%H5662>Obadiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3171>Jehiel<s%>, and with him two <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H8083%H6240>eighteen<s%> <S%H2145>males<s%>.
And of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H8019>Shelomith<s%>; the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3131>Josiphiah<s%>, and with him an <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H8346>threescore<s%> <S%H2145>males<s%>.
And of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H893>Bebai<s%>; <S%H2148>Zechariah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H893>Bebai<s%>, and with him <S%H6242>twenty<s%> and <S%H8083>eight<s%> <S%H2145>males<s%>.
And of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5803>Azgad<s%>; <S%H3110>Johanan<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6997>Hakkatan<s%>, and with him an <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H2145>males<s%>.

And of the <S%H314>last<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H140>Adonikam<s%>, whose <S%H8034>names<s%> are these, <S%H467>Eliphelet<s%>, <S%H3273>Jeiel<s%>, and <S%H8098>Shemaiah<s%>, and with them <S%H8346>threescore<s%> <S%H2145>males<s%>.
Of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> also of <S%H902>Bigvai<s%>; <S%H5793>Uthai<s%>, and <S%H2072%H2139>Zabbud<s%>, and with them <S%H7657>seventy<s%> <S%H2145>males<s%>.

¶ And I gathered them <S%H6908>together<s%> to the <S%H5104>river<s%> that <S%H935>runneth<s%> to <S%H163>Ahava<s%>; and there abode we in <S%H2583>tents<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>: and I <S%H995>viewed<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%>, and the <S%H3548>priests<s%>, and <S%H4672>found<s%> there none of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi<s%>.

Then <S%H7971>sent<s%> I for <S%H461>Eliezer<s%>, for <S%H740>Ariel<s%>, for <S%H8098>Shemaiah<s%>, and for <S%H494>Elnathan<s%>, and for <S%H3402>Jarib<s%>, and for <S%H494>Elnathan<s%>, and for <S%H5416>Nathan<s%>, and for <S%H2148>Zechariah<s%>, and for <S%H4918>Meshullam<s%>, chief <S%H7218>men<s%>; also for <S%H3114>Joiarib<s%>, and for <S%H494>Elnathan<s%>, men of <S%H995>understanding<s%>.

And I <S%H6680>sent<s%> them with <S%H3318>commandment<s%> unto <S%H112>Iddo<s%> the <S%H7218>chief<s%> at the <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H3703>Casiphia<s%>, and I <S%H7760%H6310>told<s%> them <S%H1697>what<s%> they should <S%H1696>say<s%> unto <S%H112>Iddo<s%>, and to his <S%H251>brethren<s%> the <S%H5411%H5411>Nethinims<s%>, at the <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H3703>Casiphia<s%>, that they should <S%H935>bring<s%> unto us <S%H8334>ministers<s%> for the <S%H1004>house<s%> of our <S%H430>God<s%>.

And by the <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H3027>hand<s%> of our <S%H430>God<s%> upon us they <S%H935>brought<s%> us a <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H7922>understanding<s%>, of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H4249>Mahli<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>; and <S%H8274>Sherebiah<s%>, with his <S%H1121>sons<s%> and his <S%H251>brethren<s%>, <S%H8083%H6240>eighteen<s%>;
And <S%H2811>Hashabiah<s%>, and with him <S%H3470>Jeshaiah<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H4847>Merari<s%>, his <S%H251>brethren<s%> and their <S%H1121>sons<s%>, <S%H6242>twenty<s%>;

Also of the <S%H5411>Nethinims<s%>, whom <S%H1732>David<s%> and the <S%H8269>princes<s%> had <S%H5414>appointed<s%> for the <S%H5656>service<s%> of the <S%H3881>Levites<s%>, two <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H5411>Nethinims<s%>: all of them were <S%H5344>expressed<s%> by <S%H8034>name<s%>.

¶ Then I <S%H7121>proclaimed<s%> a <S%H6685>fast<s%> there, at the <S%H5104>river<s%> of <S%H163>Ahava<s%>, that we might <S%H6031>afflict<s%> ourselves <S%H6440>before<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%>, to <S%H1245>seek<s%> of him a <S%H3477>right<s%> <S%H1870>way<s%> for us, and for our little <S%H2945>ones<s%>, and for all our <S%H7399>substance<s%>.

For I was <S%H954>ashamed<s%> to <S%H7592>require<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> a band of <S%H2428>soldiers<s%> and <S%H6571>horsemen<s%> to <S%H5826>help<s%> us against the <S%H341>enemy<s%> in the <S%H1870>way<s%>: because we had <S%H559>spoken<s%> unto the <S%H4428>king<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, The <S%H3027>hand<s%> of our <S%H430>God<s%> is upon all them for <S%H2896>good<s%> that <S%H1245>seek<s%> him; but his <S%H5797>power<s%> and his <S%H639>wrath<s%> is against all them that <S%H5800>forsake<s%> him.
So we <S%H6684>fasted<s%> and <S%H1245>besought<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> for this: and he was <S%H6279>intreated<s%> of us.

¶ Then I <S%H914>separated<s%> <S%H8147%H6240>twelve<s%> of the <S%H8269>chief<s%> of the <S%H3548>priests<s%>, <S%H8274>Sherebiah<s%>, <S%H2811>Hashabiah<s%>, and <S%H6235>ten<s%> of their <S%H251>brethren<s%> with them,

And <S%H8254>weighed<s%> unto them the <S%H3701>silver<s%>, and the <S%H2091>gold<s%>, and the <S%H3627>vessels<s%>, even the <S%H8641>offering<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of our <S%H430>God<s%>, which the <S%H4428>king<s%>, and his <S%H3289>counsellers<s%>, and his <S%H8269>lords<s%>, and all <S%H3478>Israel<s%> there <S%H4672>present<s%>, had <S%H7311>offered<s%>:

I even <S%H8254>weighed<s%> unto their <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H3603>talents<s%> of <S%H3701>silver<s%>, and <S%H3701>silver<s%> <S%H3627>vessels<s%> an <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H3603>talents<s%>, and of <S%H2091>gold<s%> an <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H3603>talents<s%>;

Also <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H3713>basons<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%>, of a <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H150>drams<s%>; and <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3627>vessels<s%> of <S%H2896%H6668>fine<s%> <S%H5178>copper<s%>, <S%H2532>precious<s%> as <S%H2091>gold<s%>.

And I <S%H559>said<s%> unto them, Ye are <S%H6944>holy<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>; the <S%H3627>vessels<s%> are <S%H6944>holy<s%> also; and the <S%H3701>silver<s%> and the <S%H2091>gold<s%> are a freewill <S%H5071>offering<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of your <S%H1>fathers<s%>.

<S%H8245>Watch<s%> ye, and <S%H8104>keep<s%> them, until ye <S%H8254>weigh<s%> them <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H8269>chief<s%> of the <S%H3548>priests<s%> and the <S%H3881>Levites<s%>, and <S%H8269>chief<s%> of the <S%H1>fathers<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, at <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, in the <S%H3957>chambers<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.

So <S%H6901>took<s%> the <S%H3548>priests<s%> and the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> the <S%H4948>weight<s%> of the <S%H3701>silver<s%>, and the <S%H2091>gold<s%>, and the <S%H3627>vessels<s%>, to <S%H935>bring<s%> them to <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> unto the <S%H1004>house<s%> of our <S%H430>God<s%>.

¶ Then we <S%H5265>departed<s%> from the <S%H5104>river<s%> of <S%H163>Ahava<s%> on the <S%H8147%H6240>twelfth<s%> day of the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%>, to <S%H3212>go<s%> unto <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>: and the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of our <S%H430>God<s%> was upon us, and he <S%H5337>delivered<s%> us from the <S%H3709>hand<s%> of the <S%H341>enemy<s%>, and of such as lay in <S%H693>wait<s%> by the <S%H1870>way<s%>.
And we <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, and <S%H3427>abode<s%> there <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%>.

¶ Now on the <S%H7243>fourth<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> was the <S%H3701>silver<s%> and the <S%H2091>gold<s%> and the <S%H3627>vessels<s%> <S%H8254>weighed<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of our <S%H430>God<s%> by the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H4822>Meremoth<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H223>Uriah<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%>; and with him was <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6372>Phinehas<s%>; and with them was <S%H3107>Jozabad<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3442>Jeshua<s%>, and <S%H5129>Noadiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1131>Binnui<s%>, <S%H3881>Levites<s%>;
By <S%H4557>number<s%> and by <S%H4948>weight<s%> of every one: and all the <S%H4948>weight<s%> was <S%H3789>written<s%> at that <S%H6256>time<s%>.

Also the <S%H1121>children<s%> of those that had been carried <S%H1473>away<s%>, which were come <S%H935>out<s%> of the <S%H7628>captivity<s%>, <S%H7126>offered<s%> burnt <S%H5930>offerings<s%> unto the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, <S%H8147%H6240>twelve<s%> <S%H6499>bullocks<s%> for all <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, <S%H8673>ninety<s%> and <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H352>rams<s%>, <S%H7657>seventy<s%> and <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3532>lambs<s%>, <S%H8147%H6240>twelve<s%> he <S%H6842>goats<s%> for a sin <S%H2403>offering<s%>: all this was a burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%> unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.

¶ And they <S%H5414>delivered<s%> the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H1881>commissions<s%> unto the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H323>lieutenants<s%>, and to the <S%H6346>governors<s%> on this <S%H5676>side<s%> the <S%H5104>river<s%>: and they <S%H5375>furthered<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%>, and the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>.
